author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEXTER STRENGTHENS A LITTLE MORE... ...LIKELY TO BECOME A POWERFUL EXTRATROPICAL CYCLONE BY FRIDAY AS IT TRAVERSES THE NORTH ATLANTIC...
summary: ...DEXTER STRENGTHENS A LITTLE MORE... ...LIKELY TO BECOME A POWERFUL EXTRATROPICAL CYCLONE BY FRIDAY AS IT TRAVERSES THE NORTH ATLANTIC... As of 11:00 AM AST Wed Aug 06 the center of Dexter was located near 39.9, -58.2 with movement ENE at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 999 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Dexter (AT4/AL042025)
